body.name: [AI Auto Focus & Keystone] VOPLLS 4K Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, Netflix Official Smart Video Projector, 600 ANSI Outdoor Movie Projector with Screen, 3D Dolby Audio/MAX 300'' Display.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Official Netflix License, Watch Shows Online】VOPLLS Smart Projector with built-in smart operating system that supports over 1,000,000+ videos, including certified Netflix, Prime Video, and YouTube. With just one click, you can quickly enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows without purchasing an additional TV stick. Besides, you can access the "Open Browser", "My App", and "APP STORE" for unlimited entertainment options at any time!

【Auto Focus & Keystone Correction and 180° Integrated Stand】VOPLLS projector utilizes state-of-the-art AI focusing and displacement gyroscope technology that detects in real-time and automatically corrects within 3 seconds to ensure a clear projection. Equipped with a 6D keystone correction function, it can automatically adapt to any wall and remove the restriction of placement. 180° rotatable Stand simplifies the installation and realizes the best projection effect in any scene.

【True Audio-Visual Feast, Dolby Audio Supported】 VOPLLS video projector with built-in hi-fi stereo speakers, dolby audio support feature, and unique sealed core technology that effectively reduces noise by up to 80%, allow you to fully immerse yourself in the dolby audio environment. The icing on the cake is that VOPLLS bluetooth projector can also connect to external speakers or use it as a standalone speaker via Bluetooth 5.2.

【Achieve Zero-Latency 2.4G/5G Dual-Band WiFi Connection】VOPLLS wifi projector boasts a robust 2.4G/5G dual-band WiFi connection, facilitating seamless linking to your cell phone or computer, ensuring immediate and steady transmission. Bid farewell to delays or lags in projection, significantly enhancing gaming and wireless projection encounters, notably during Switch/PS4/5/X-box sessions. VOPLLS outdoor projector is perfect for those who favor the big screen movie/gaming experience.

【4K Supported, 600 ANSI Brightness, Worry-free Shopping】 With native 1080P resolution, 600 ANSI brightness, 15000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, VOPLLS 4k projector is at least 95% brighter and clearer than other 1080P projectors. Whether day or night, at home, outdoors, or in business meetings, indulge in the ultimate joy of projection anytime, anywhere.In addition, the quick response within 12 hours, 2-year product replacement warranty and lifetime after-sales service make you worry-free.

Is the projector compatible with Google smartphones? Due to mirroring protocol issues of Motorola and Google phones, it prohibits screen mirroring directly from the projector. You need to have a Google Chromecast to connect it. Can I use it for business presentation? Office software such as PPT via USB is not supported, please connect the projector to a computer for play. How to enter Netflix and Prime Video? VOPLLS smart rojector comes with officially-licensed Netflix and Prime Video. No need for TV stick anymore, quickly entering these Apps with just one button by remote control. Does the projector have good sound quality? Does it support Dolby Atmos? The VOPLLS video projector has built-in hi-fi stereo speakers and supports Dolby Audio, which provides detailed, stereo and stunning surround sound effects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING! Nice Projector.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A superior HD projector! Especially good for nighttime movie watching, especially if you're craving HD blockbusters. We had a great time using this projector for the first time at a community movie night. The setup process was easy, the layout and controls were intuitive, and menu navigation was effortless. I found that after placing the projector in the ideal location, it only took a few minutes of digital keystone adjustment to get a perfect fit. It's worth noting that the trapezoid adjustment is completely digital, with no manual knobs or adjustment levers.The projector's own speakers also performed very clearly. I connected the projector to my laptop via the included HDMI cable and all went smoothly. We projected the image onto a 200-inch screen and the image quality was outstanding. It was vivid, clear, sharp and bright! Definitely comparable to movie theater quality.Overall, this is an excellent projector and definitely worth spending the extra money on Amazon to avoid buying a cheap model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, impressive projector
reviews.reviewText: I've been very impressed by this projector. It's very capable for its compact size with great brightness, sound, and functionality. It's great to have Netflix and Prime right on it (don't need another device for the projector to connect to) and the autofocus and auto keystone functions are really helpful. Everything is controlled by the remote, and while there are buttons that are a tiny bit confusing, it only takes a minute to figure it all out.Was glad it came with a screen and we were impressed with some of the other games and apps that it came with. We've been having fun playing connect 4 on the ceiling. It comes with the expected cables and gear for the screen. I was a little nervous about the hinge/platform but it works very well. All in all, a great set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big bang for the bucks!
reviews.reviewText: We watch movies a lot. This projector has excellent picture color and clarity. Its design helps to eliminate having multiple cords and cables. I did experience issue with auto focus ,however the company replaced product expeditiously. Outstanding quality, very satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking UI, bright and high res projection
reviews.reviewText: This projector is a great product for the price point. Super bright projection, the user interface looks like a smart TV and is very easy to navigate. The auto keystone works amazingly an is honestly so nice coming from a projector with manual keystone. This is a great projector for a home theater and is super portable if you wanted to bring it to events.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously good projector
reviews.reviewText: I've wanted to upgrade my previous projector for some time now, and I thought I'd give this one a try. This projector does cost more, but it genuinely performs amazingly.It comes with a HDMI cable, AV adapter cable, power cable, a projector screen, and a remote (the remote batteries aren't included, so make sure to have some AAA batteries in hand or add to order).The image quality is really good. This along with the auto focus and keystone feature makes it such a great projector. You just need to angle the projector toward your wall/screen, and these features automatically fixes any distortion in the image. Just these things alone make the projector worth the price.The sound is also pretty good. I mostly use it indoor, and it can definitely get loud. So far I've been very happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Colors are totally washed out. Brightness is very poor even at maximum output. Features are really cool but they don't matter at all due to very poor picture output. Don't buy this, its really really bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am impressed
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure what to expect. The last projector, from many years ago. was four times the price and burned incandescent bulbs frequently. This VOPLLS uses an LED as the bulb and it is surprisingly bright. I just tested it in the office with the provided projection sheet and was very happy. This projector started immediately and automatically adjusted keystone and focus. It projects its own pattern and uses that to set the keystone so the picture is perfectly square no matter how far off center the projector is. It is like magic, having had to do this manually in other devices. In addition, it sets the "keystone" in BOTH directions, up and down and left to right. When it starts the first time, it walks you through getting hooked to the Wi-Fi and that worked perfectly the first time. It then came right up like a "Smart TV" with selections for Netflix, Youtube, Amazon and more, built in. So, once you log in by scanning a 2D barcode, you are right in the app for that service. The remote control has an excellent feel and the buttons are well-placed, especially the back button. I actually bought this for a little different reason. I make (poor) sculptures and often need to cut out pieces of sheet steel (22gauge). I draw then in Photoshop or other program and need to project them on a sheet of steel (4'x8') to trace them. I then cut them out with hand or power shears. Other projectors are not bright enough and have to be lined up perfectly. This is now perfect for my needs, as it adjusts to a square projection and is bright enough to use in the daytime in the shop with windows. I can send the images to it from my phone and I have a ton of flexibility. Overall, I am thrilled with this new addition to my shop. And I can watch some welding videos from it in between projects. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'll be honest, I wasn't expecting too much. I've not been in the market for a projector for some time, so had modest expectations of anything at this price point. Happy to report I have been pleasantly surprised. Set-up is easy (don't forget to only agree to updates, rather than agreeing to everything, since that includes access to your usage data, which you might not be comfy with - I'm not, but it's easy to say no to), auto-focus was quick and accurate, and we were quickly away. Netflix, Prime Video and YouTube all come pre-installed, plus there are HDMI and USB sockets for other sources, plus you can cast to this from Android or iPhone/iPad. All in all, very versatile! Minor niggles - the audio from the in-built speaker is adequate but lacking, as you might expect from a speaker in a small plastic enclosure, but this is easily circumvented by Bluetoothing to the speaker of your choice. Oh, and the fan could be quieter. It's not loud, but I've heard quieter. But otherwise, all good, especially at this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smart little projector comes presented in a sturdy cardboard box with pictures of the contents etc.Included inside the box are two more cardboard boxes one containing all the wires such as power cord, HDMI cord, AV cords as well as a remote control, in the other box there is an screen, rope and a screen installation instruction leaflet.In the main bit of the box there is the securely packed projector itself along with instructions booklet and leaflets as well as a very small Allen key if you need to tighten/loosen the rotation bit of the projectors stand.The projector supports 4k & 1080p, 600ANSI lumens brightness and 15000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and HDR10+ Dynamic image processing technology and has Netflix built in, it supports screen size of up to 40-300 inch.All in all this is a great sized compact projector that is easy to set up and displays a good quality picture and the sound isn’t too bad either, you can connect to it via WiFi or Bluetooth you can also do miracast from a laptop, tablet, phone.You can also project on to the ceiling as the projector con rotated 180 degrees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Compact and full of features describes this projector. It utilises a Linux OS which may feel strange to Windows/android or iOS users but is easy to use. There's the usual data consent options to consider, personally I just deny all but the necessary options.Connection to my wi-fi was simple, and being preloaded with apps such as prime video, youtube and netflix made getting started a breeze. Just login and watch. Other media can be accessed as well. I can stream from my NAS system, android or idevices via wifi, Bluetooth, hdmi or usb.Autofocus had a crystal clear picture on my wall within seconds. Ijust found the sound quality to be lacking due to the builtin speaker. However connecting my soundbar via bluetooth solved that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Plug In And Play Home Projector Setup
reviews.reviewText: This smart projector is a plug in and play solution for getting smart apps and entertainment quickly and easily. The controller needs 2 AAA batteries (not included), and once plugged in after the initial setup it’s ready to use with apps like Netflix and Youtube already pre-installed. The projector already has a built in speaker that is quite decent and can output loud enough sound with enough bass for casual viewing - it is very quick and easy to get picture and sound up and running in a light compact package.The projector has a gunmetal grey colour which you could easily mistake for metal, but upon opening I was a little disappointed to see a full plastic build, even for the base and hinge which make it quite cheap feeling. The remote has nice clickly tactile buttons with a soft touch finish, and it has quick buttons for Netflix, Prime Video, Youtube and a Web Browser.I was very happy to see the projector has auto-focus which runs automatically as it sets what it thinks is the best focus level for you, but you can always adjust it manually and turn off the auto focus options if you prefer. Picture quality is 1080p and looks crisp and colourful for the price point. I did notice the edges tend to look more blurry, but for causal viewing for films and games it performs very well.The projector is running ‘Linux OS’ which seems to be a smart TV distro with added projector features. Whilst this operating system has a nice simple design, it isn’t as ‘mature’ as other popular systems like Android or Google TV and thus has more limited app support which is important to keep in mind if you were wanting to run Android Apps on it.Overall, whilst this projector is easy to setup and get up and running quickly, it’s build quality is not the best. It’s clear that the money has been spent on the internals rather than the exterior build, but it does make it feel cheap with how light it is. Picture quality is very good overall, and aside for some blurring around the edges for basic viewing needs it does very well - however springing for more expensive options would yield better brightness and colour reproduction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with the quality of the image and the sound.First off, the packaging was impeccable. The projector was well packed and nothing was damaged.Upon unboxing, I was immediately impressed with the quality of the packaging.The projector itself is very easy to install. It came with all the necessary cables and it was a breeze to follow the instructions. Once installed, the image was stunning and the sound was excellent. The color balance was perfect and the brightness was just right.also really like the convenience of the projector. It has a built-in USB port for easy file sharing and it has a wireless option as well. This way, I can easily connect it to my laptop and project the image onto a big screen without any hassle.In conclusion, I am very happy with this projector.The image is great, the sound is awesome, and it's super easy to install. Overall, I would definitely recommend this projector to anyone in the market for a new one
